line.comment: * write to player logbook: printf: fmt='Bail debug: ship bailed: %s in %s', [THIS], [SECTOR], null, null, null
* write to log file 7564 append=[TRUE] value=$txt

sval.val: write to player logbook: printf: fmt='Bail debug: ship bailed: %s in %s', [THIS], [SECTOR], null, null, null
write to log file 7564 append=[TRUE] value=$txt
